name: Master-8
description:
DEMO

Controls:

WASD: move

Left click: Use left weapon

Right Click: Use right weapon

Space: Boost

LShift: Special (if available)

Scroll Wheel: Zoom in and Out (If possible)

In 40XX, the world is controlled by an AI known as The Master. Little is known about him, only that he controls humankind with an iron grip. His power is immense and his eyes are everywhere. There are those that wish to destroy the AI and free the world, but his location is unknown. The only known map to The Master was broken up and a piece given to eight different guardians, the best mech pilots to ever exist. You are one lone pilot, set out on a journey to gather the eight map pieces and destroy The Master, freeing the world from his grasp.
